page.title: 05Garston Bus Garage
page.content: There are over 100 buses in Garston bus garage. They are single decker and double decker buses and coaches. There are 300 people who work there. The buses travel all over Watford and some go into London and other large towns such as Luton and the city of St Albans. The weather affects the number of people who use the buses. In winter more people use the local services. There are 34 bus stops in Garston. The busiest day is Friday when more people travel by bus to the shops in Watford. In the school holidays they have some problems with children writing on the seats and refusing to pay fares. The fare for a child from Garston to Watford centre is 22 pence. A lot of old people use the bus to travel into Watford using a special bus pass.
